Text.val: 03-DEC-2002 AS, befeore actually trying to export from Hyparchive,
the connection is checked (mghypa_testconnection) to avoid
29-JAN-2003 AS, replced DLL calls (mghypa) by call to GB546
which checks both: Hyparchive Server AND Hyparchive MSSQL.
ICA293 should not hang anymore if Hyparchive is down.
